summary: The story of Coco Chanel's rise from obscure beginnings to the heights of the fashion world.
cast: Audrey Tautou|Benoît Poelvoorde|Alessandro Nivola|Marie Gillain|Emmanuelle Devos|Régis Royer|Etienne Bartholomeus|Yan Duffas|Fabien Béhar|Roch Leibovici|Jean-Yves Chatelais|Pierre Diot|Vincent Nemeth|Bruno Abraham-Kremer|Lisa Cohen|Inès Bessalem|Marie-Bénédicte Roy|Emilie Gavois-Kahn|Fanny Deblock|Claude Brécourt|Karina Marimon|Bruno Paviot|Franck Monsigny|Marie Parouty|Jean-Chrétien Sibertin-Blanc|Marie-Josée Hubert|Patrick Laviosa|Kim Schwarck|Marthe Drouin|Frantz Herman|Emma Jouannet|Berenice Sand
keywords: life of celebrity before becoming famous|social status|1920s|beach|wealth
title: Coco, de la rebeldía a la leyenda de Chanel
